::Bazooka::

    He began the procedure on Mantella. He knew what the process involved. 
Bazooka pressed all the right buttons. The process would only take a few 
minutes. And it would include some new abilities. For Mantella there would be 
better weapon systems, an enhanced healing process, stronger claws and a 
sheild device.
    Bobertron would get an entirely new beast mode, as he wanted. (I live 
near him, he told me to.) He would get a new prehistoric mode, that of the 
most terrifying sea creature to ever swim, a Megalodon. It was a sixty foot 
long great white shark. It could easily kill a Tyrannosaurus Rex in it jaws. 
Even the Mosasaurus was afraid of it. He would also get a limited cloaking 
feild, it would last for about 1 cycle.
